name: Modern Treasury
headline: Payment operations tools for money movement.
description: Modern Treasury offers tools that automate the full cycle of money movement—from payment initiation, through approvals, to reconciliation—and are accessible through web application or API.

# Payment Operations Built for the Instant Economy
Build your best business with faster payments, smart workflows, and real-time visibility, powered by AI.
[Talk to us→](http://www.moderntreasury.com/</talk-to-us>)[Watch a demo→](http://www.moderntreasury.com/</resources/platform-overview-video>)

Use Cases
## Get Ready for Real-Time
Welcome to the Instant Economy, where consumers expect fast, seamless experiences, and companies must deliver in real-time.
Faster PaymentsSmart WorkflowsReal-Time Visibility
![Illustration depicting the creation of a payment order via UI or API](http://www.moderntreasury.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.sanity.io%2Fimages%2F8nmbzj0x%2Fproduction%2Fedac239bb8f557d735a8c28e909e03a569c9fcc7-1080x1080.png&w=3840&q=75)
## Faster Payments
Accelerate payments through the automation of traditional and faster payment rails.
Programmatically, initiate, track, and reconcile payments across global banks and rails.
Integrate instant payments (RTP, FedNow) to improve customer experiences and reduce costs.
For Product Teams
## One Platform for Payment Operations
Empower your business and delight your customers with the only platform that moves, tracks, and reconciles payments in real-time.
[Explore the Platform→](http://www.moderntreasury.com/</platform>)
## Automate Money Movement
Programmatically move money via traditional and instant payment rails at over 40+ global banks.
[Explore Payments→](http://www.moderntreasury.com/</products/payments>)
![Modern Treasury connections visualization](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/8nmbzj0x/production/af432ff15f4c8dd9331e2022058116871d5815ea-800x600.svg)
## Track Transactions Seamlessly
Track and manage transactions and balances in a performant database. Unify your financial data and make sense of it with AI. 
[Explore Ledgers→](http://www.moderntreasury.com/</products/ledgers>)
## Reconcile Transactions Continuously 
Reconcile your payment operation transactions in real-time. Powered by granular matching, AI-driven exception management, and a system that learns and adapts over time.
[Explore Reconciliation→](http://www.moderntreasury.com/</solutions/reconciliation>)
## Enterprise-Grade Security
Support for RBAC, SSO, SCIM, and SIEM. SOC I, SOC II, and PCI DSS compliant.
## Seamless Connectivity 
Start faster with pre-built integrations and flexible methods to ingest data via UI and API.
## Modular Architecture
Modernize your entire infrastructure, or solve specific pain points, at your pace.
## Robust Controls
Granular, conditional, and sequenced approvals for payments and reconciliation.
How Companies Use Modern Treasury 
## Payments Transformation is Business Transformation
Whether your business is new to hyperscale or a generational company, Modern Treasury is the partner of choice. 
![An image of the sky with the Navan logo on top](http://www.moderntreasury.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.sanity.io%2Fimages%2F8nmbzj0x%2Fproduction%2Ff77ccf49aadf990d72992adf0d4b63d1f787d77a-1500x2000.jpg&w=3840&q=75)

Designed for Confidence
## AI That Puts You In Control
From controlled AI suggestions to granular permissions, Modern Treasury has everything enterprises need to confidently manage money at scale.
[Our Approach to AI→](http://www.moderntreasury.com/</journal/adding-ai-to-modern-treasury-reconciliation>)
![A finance professional using a computer with AI-driven reconciliation match suggestions displayed](http://www.moderntreasury.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.sanity.io%2Fimages%2F8nmbzj0x%2Fproduction%2F9f8dd5f7cf61ced11d6d7a76b77e2a5dde68bddb-2000x1500.png&w=3840&q=75)
Professional Services
## Expertise That Cuts Through Complexity
Reach your goals by collaborating with our expert team to implement faster, unlock new use cases, and scale efficiently. 
[Learn More→](http://www.moderntreasury.com/</solutions/professional-services>)
![A small group works together. There is a flow chart diagram in the corner.](http://www.moderntreasury.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.sanity.io%2Fimages%2F8nmbzj0x%2Fproduction%2F3c8f94846d30a16f0b481a002d81f0eca6023671-2000x1500.png&w=3840&q=75)

Use Cases
## Get Ready for Real-Time
Welcome to the Instant Economy, where consumers expect fast, seamless experiences, and companies must deliver in real-time.
Faster PaymentsSmart WorkflowsReal-Time Visibility
![Illustration depicting the creation of a payment order via UI or API⟨20⟩]
## Faster Payments
Accelerate payments through the automation of traditional and faster payment rails.
Programmatically, initiate, track, and reconcile payments across global banks and rails.
Integrate instant payments (RTP, FedNow) to improve customer experiences and reduce costs.
For Product Teams
## One Platform for Payment Operations
Empower your business and delight your customers with the only platform that moves, tracks, and reconciles payments in real-time.
Explore the Platform→⟨21⟩
## Automate Money Movement
Programmatically move money via traditional and instant payment rails at over 40+ global banks.
Explore Payments→⟨22⟩
![Modern Treasury connections visualization⟨23⟩]
## Track Transactions Seamlessly
Track and manage transactions and balances in a performant database. Unify your financial data and make sense of it with AI. 
Explore Ledgers→⟨24⟩
## Reconcile Transactions Continuously 
Reconcile your payment operation transactions in real-time. Powered by granular matching, AI-driven exception management, and a system that learns and adapts over time.
Explore Reconciliation→⟨25⟩
## Enterprise-Grade Security
Support for RBAC, SSO, SCIM, and SIEM. SOC I, SOC II, and PCI DSS compliant.
## Seamless Connectivity 
Start faster with pre-built integrations and flexible methods to ingest data via UI and API.
## Modular Architecture
Modernize your entire infrastructure, or solve specific pain points, at your pace.
## Robust Controls
Granular, conditional, and sequenced approvals for payments and reconciliation.
How Companies Use Modern Treasury 
## Payments Transformation is Business Transformation
Whether your business is new to hyperscale or a generational company, Modern Treasury is the partner of choice. 
![An image of the sky with the Navan logo on top⟨26⟩]
## Navan reimagined expense management
Learn More→⟨27⟩
![A business professional using a computer with the C2FO logo on top of the image⟨28⟩]

![A professional man looking at paperwork beside a computer with the DriveWealth logo on top of the image⟨30⟩]

Learn More→⟨31⟩
Designed for Confidence
## AI That Puts You In Control
From controlled AI suggestions to granular permissions, Modern Treasury has everything enterprises need to confidently manage money at scale.
Our Approach to AI→⟨32⟩
![A finance professional using a computer with AI-driven reconciliation match suggestions displayed⟨33⟩]
Professional Services
## Expertise That Cuts Through Complexity
Reach your goals by collaborating with our expert team to implement faster, unlock new use cases, and scale efficiently. 
Learn More→⟨34⟩
![A small group works together. There is a flow chart diagram in the corner.⟨35⟩]

generated_description:
### Modern Treasury: A Quick Look

**Overview**  
Modern Treasury is a fintech startup based in San Francisco, founded in 2018 and an alumnus of Y Combinator's S18 batch. With a team of 160 employees, the company is focused on revolutionizing payment operations through automation.

**Mission**  
The mission of Modern Treasury is to provide tools for managing payment operations and facilitating money movement effectively. They do this by automating the entire cycle of payment—from initiation and approval to reconciliation—all accessible via a user-friendly web application or API.

**Key Features**  
- **Faster Payments**: They streamline payment processing through automation across various payment rails, including traditional and real-time options like RTP and FedNow.  
- **Smart Workflows**: The platform allows businesses to build efficient workflows for managing payments and financial operations.  
- **Real-Time Visibility**: Users can track transactions seamlessly and gain insights using AI-driven tools.

**Products**  
Modern Treasury offers several key products:  
1. **Payments**: Automated transaction initiation and management.  
2. **Ledgers**: Centralized tracking and management of financial data.  
3. **Reconciliation**: Continuous and real-time reconciliation of transaction data.

**Current Endeavors**  
The company is heavily focused on enhancing its offering to cater to the "Instant Economy," where speed and efficiency are paramount. They aim to empower businesses by providing a platform that manages, tracks, and reconciles payments all in real time.

**Notable Clients**  
Some of Modern Treasury’s clients include well-known companies like ClassPass, DriveWealth, and Gusto, showcasing their versatility across industries.

**Vision**  
In a world where consumers demand fast, reliable payments, Modern Treasury is poised to be at the forefront of payment transformation. They leverage AI to provide insights and enhance decision-making, all while maintaining stringent security measures.

For anyone delving into payment operations or looking to modernize their financial infrastructures, aligning with Modern Treasury could be a game-changer. You can find more about their tools and services on their [website](http://www.moderntreasury.com/).
